TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NavigationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含支持导航的各种方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装下载内容的浏览器样式导航上下文中的功能。 encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation. 内容可以是任何类型的.NET Framework 对象和 HTML 文件。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 一般情况下，但是，页是首选作为导航的包内容的方式 (请参阅)。In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see ). 通过提供对象的实例并调用重载的情况下，内容可以导航到接受对象的方法：Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the method that accepts an object: - - 或者，可以将导航到内容通过将相对或绝对 URI 传递给之一接受 URI 的方法重载：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute URI to one of the method overloads that accepts a URI: - - - URI，通过导航到内容将返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. 导航的生存期可以通过以下事件跟踪：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 。. 并非所有事件都发生导航; 每次都引发（已取消、 已停止或失败），将由导航时发生 （内容或内容片段） 和如何完成导航的类型确定引发的事件集。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了会引发这些事件的序列：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期间或之后导航栏中，提供，其中包括要导航到的内容的 URI 导航目标的内容有关的信息 ()，当前内容的 URI ()，并包含的对象导航到的内容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 当内容导航到，导航历史记录中记录一个条目作为导航。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 新导航时，通过调用后退导航历史记录中添加一个条目方法，或通过调用导航到前进导航历史记录中的条目。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 通过导航到一个条目后退导航历史记录，通过调用将条目添加到前进导航历史记录。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和报告是否存在条目后退和前进导航历史记录，分别。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 此外，最新的条目后退导航历史记录可以通过调用删除。Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 默认情况下，不导航历史记录中存储内容的对象的实例。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，创建每次使用导航历史记录导航到的内容对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免占用过多内存时要导航到较大数字和大段内容。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，内容的状态并不会保留从一个导航到下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 但是，WPF 提供了几种方法，使您可以导航历史记录中存储的一条内容为一段的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您还可以保留多个集的单个页面实例的状态。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 是`sealed`类，因此不能被实例化; 相反，导航器用于启用导航。 is a `sealed` class and therefore cannot be instantiated; instead, is used by navigators to enable navigation. 在 WPF 中，有两个导航器：和。In WPF, there are two navigators: and . 直观地[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]作为导航器，以提供集成的用户体验。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 以物理方式，但[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]实际使用像导航;属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]中运行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]将返回到引用，并由导航历史记录与导航历史记录管理的集成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]以下方面：Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - 当导航到内容后通过调用， ，并内[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]相关的导航历史记录条目也会添加到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]导航历史记录。When content is navigated to by calling , , and from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history. - 时中的条目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]所选[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]导致以后或向前导航到与这些条目相关联的内容。When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries. > [!NOTE] > 一个可以提供自己的导航历史记录，或使用承载它的导航器的导航历史记录。A can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it. 如果提供了自己的导航历史记录，它可以显示自己的导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]导航历史记录; 中的条目中导航这些条目不会添加到主机导航器的导航历史记录 (， ， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)])，因此，无法导航到从导航栏[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]每个 (请参阅)。If provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (, , [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each (see ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定后退导航历史记录中是否存在至少一个条目。 to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history. 此属性应检查，然后再调; 如果称为和后退导航历史记录中没有任何条目引发。This property should be inspected before calling ; if is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果导航历史记录共享的多个导航器 (， )、 最新的条目后退导航历史记录可能不具有已添加的为当前导航器。that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (, ), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the for the current navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Content { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Content : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对包含当前内容的对象的引用。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.

value.span: 一个对象，它是对包含当前内容的对象的引用。

span.span: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容可以设置两种方法之一：Content can be set in one of two ways: - 直接使用，方式将其设置为对对象的引用。Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object. - 通过调用间接， ，或。Indirectly, by calling , , or . 设置由于导航是异步的因此启动一个新的导航;不会返回一个值，如果在设置之后立即检查。Setting initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentSource As Uri
public: property Uri ^ CurrentSource { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次导航到的内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI of the content that was last navigated to.

value.span: 一个内容的上次导航到，如果导航到使用 URI; 否则为。

span.span: A for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a URI; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值之前已成功完成到不同的 URI 的导航属性不会更改。The value of the property is not changed until navigation to a different URI has completed successfully. 可以使用仅限片段的 URI 设置。 can be set with a fragment-only URI.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FragmentNavigation As FragmentNavigationEventHandler

summary.span: 当开始导航到某个内容片段时发生，如果所需片段位于当前内容中，它会立即发生；或者，如果所需片段位于不同内容中，它会在加载了源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 内容之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，内容片段是内容，它是所包含的命名，即其设置属性，例如：By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named , which is a whose attribute is set, eg: ``` ... ``` 导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过采用以下格式为后缀提供 URI 的片段：You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a URI with a suffix in the following format: \#*FragmentName*\#*FragmentName* 下面显示了一个 URI，引用内容片段的示例：The following shows an example of a URI that refers to a content fragment: `http://www.microsoft.com/targetpage.xaml#FragmentName` 在源页面加载后 (后引发事件)，片段导航开始并尝试定位[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]片段。After the source page loads (after event is raised), fragment navigation begins and the attempts to locate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment. 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]找到片段，则指示内容导航器 (， ) 以显示该片段。If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment is found, instructs the content navigator (, ) to show the fragment. 如果需要更改此行为，则可以处理提供您自己的片段导航行为。If you need to change this behavior, you can handle to provide your own fragment navigation behavior. 传递参数公开为此，有用的属性包括： is passed a parameter which exposes properties that are useful for this purpose, including: - 拥有此导航服务的导航器 (， )。The navigator that owns this navigation service (, ). - 片段名称。The fragment name. 您可以处理重写默认 WPF 片段实现与自定义实现。You can handle to override the default WPF fragment implementation with your own custom implementation. 如果这样做，需要设置到`true`; 否则为为应用处理行为的默认 WPF 片段。If you do so, you need to set to `true`; otherwise, the default WPF fragment processing behavior is applied. 应避免直接初始化中的导航事件处理程序。You should avoid directly initiating navigation from within a event handler. 由于在现有的导航，启动从新的导航过程中引发事件处理程序将创建嵌套的导航，这可能会导致引发。Since is raised during an existing navigation, initiating a new navigation from a event handler creates a nested navigation that can cause the to be thrown. 相反，可以间接启动导航通过创建一个异步工作项使用。Instead, you can indirectly initiate navigation by creating an asynchronous work item using the . > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 片段导航不支持对松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页 (仅标记[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件的工具`Page`作为根元素) 在以下情况下：Fragment navigation is not supported for loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] pages (markup-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files with `Page` as the root element) in the following cases: > > • 导航到松散中的片段时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页。• When navigating to a fragment in a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > • 时导航从一个松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页中另一个松散的片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页。• When navigating from a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page to a fragment in another loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > 但是，松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页可以导航到自己的片段。However, a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can navigate to its own fragments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理以提供自定义的片段导航行为。The following example shows how to handle to provide custom fragment navigation behavior. 在这种情况下，该示例打开出错[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]页上，如果源中的片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]找不到页面。In this case, the example opens an error [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page if the fragment in the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page is not found. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航器具有处理内容导航。A navigator has a that handles content navigation. WPF 具有两个导航器：和。WPF has two navigators: and . 若要处理导航请求和管理导航生存期，导航器将使用 WPF 导航服务，它将作为实现类。To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the WPF navigation service, which is implemented as the class. 通过导航器承载的内容可以获取对导航器的引用通过调用方法。Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's by calling the method. 返回`null`时`dependencyObject`: returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - 是。Is a . - 是的：Is a that: 1. 由另一个导航器承载。Is hosted by another navigator. 2. 具有其属性设置为。Has its property set to . - 不是内容的由导航器承载的一部分。Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator. WPF 提供了两个快捷方式来获取对引用:WPF offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the : - 处理到导航可以从访问本身通过获取的值及其属性。The that processed the navigation to a can be accessed from the itself by getting the value of its property. - 所使用的来处理导航可以访问通过获取的值属性。The that is used by a to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以通过调用检索导航服务。The following example shows how a can retrieve a navigation service by calling . [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode2)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 然后再调用，则属性进行检查，以确定后退导航历史记录中是否存在条目。Before calling , the property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history. ## Examples 下面的示例导航到最新条目后退导航历史记录，如果存在。The following example navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if one exists. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowBackCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowbackcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowBackCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowbackcode)]

span.span: is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GoForward() cil managed

summary.span: 当已加载、分析并开始呈现目标导航内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您处理如果你需要了解有关在加载完成后将导航请求的信息。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion. 此信息位于对象传递给事件处理程序，并包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 内容和它的 URI。The content and its URI. - 导航器 (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他数据，如果启动了导航，通过调用或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 响应详细信息 (使用对象)。Response details (using a object). 无法找到或加载在这种情况下，源页时则不会引发引发。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)]

summary.span: 异步导航到指定的源内容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to the specified source content.

Public Function Navigate (root As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 异步导航到某个对象中包含的内容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将导航到指定的`root`如果满足以下条件： will navigate to the specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - 事件不会被取消。The event is not cancelled. - Web 请求 (请参阅) 可以创建。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果`root`是`null`，现有内容 () 被清除。If `root` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 当下载 Web 内容时，可能会收到 Web 异常 (例如，404： 找不到文件)。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 你可以处理此类异常从。You can handle such exceptions from . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到对象，其中包含源内容树。The following example shows how to navigate to a object containing the source content tree. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 对象。

summary.span: 异步导航到由 URI 指定的内容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a URI.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`可以是一个[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]或有效的包 URI (请参阅[WPF 中的 Pack Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md))。The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack URI (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)). 将导航到指定的 URI`source`如果满足以下条件： will navigate to the URI specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - 事件不会被取消。The event is not cancelled. - Web 请求 (请参阅) 可以创建。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果`source`是`null`，现有内容 () 被清除。If `source` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 当下载 Web 内容时，可能会收到 Web 异常 (例如，404： 找不到文件)。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 你可以处理此类异常从。You can handle such exceptions from . 可以使用以导航到内容片段。You can use to navigate to a content fragment. 如果由 URI 标识的内容为当前内容，它不再次下载。If the content identified by the URI is the current content, it is not downloaded again. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到的 URI。The following example shows how to navigate to a URI. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatecode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatecode)]

.method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source, object navigationState) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri, navigationState As Object) As Boolean
public: bool Navigate(Uri ^ source, System::Object ^ navigationState);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 对象。

span.span: A object initialized with the URI for the desired content.

param.name: navigationState
param.span: 一个包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

summary.span: 异步导航到位于某个 URI 中的源内容，并传递一个对象，其中包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a URI, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于导航是异步的就可以进行多个导航正在进行的一次。Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time. 例如，如果在单个页面上有两个子框架，可以浏览这两个框架。For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating. 在此情况下，引发的各种导航事件可能会引发多个时间，一个用于每段内容要导航到，而不一定代表以便导航请求。In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested. 因此，如果某个特定导航请求需要处理特定于单个请求的数据，它不能使用适用于所有导航请求的数据。Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests. 相反，可以使用`navigationState`要处理的导航是特定于一个导航请求传递数据。Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request. 以下事件自变量提供对导航状态的访问：The following event arguments provide access to navigation state: - (传递给事件)。 (passed to the event). - (传递给， ，事件处理程序)。 (passed to the , , event handlers). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到的 URI，并传递导航状态。The following example demonstrates navigating to a URI and passing navigation state. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅适用于独立应用程序和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]内容。This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content. 此方法能够提供相同的行为，并将其扩展通过确保正在下载的内容置于一个部分信任安全沙盒 (具有默认 Internet 区域集的权限-请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md))。This method exhibits the same behavior as , and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigated As NavigatedEventHandler

summary.span: 找到导航的目标内容且可通过 属性得到这些内容时发生，即使尚未加载完毕也是如此。

span.span: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the property, although it may not have completed loading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您处理如果您需要下载开始时发现导航请求有关的信息。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences. 此信息位于对象传递给事件处理程序，并包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 源页中。The source page. 当引发，则至少属于源页面的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]树已分析，并附加到目标内容控件。When is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control. - 请求的 URI。The requested URI. - 导航器 (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他数据，如果启动了导航，通过调用或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 响应详细信息 (使用对象)。Response details (using a object). 无法找到或加载在这种情况下，源页时则不会引发引发。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigating As NavigatingCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 请求新导航时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当请求一个新导航时发生，但在源之前请求内容，包括何时引发： is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when: - 调用 。 is called. - 或称为 (或从导航栏中选择一个条目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)])。 or is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]). - 内容片段导航到。A content fragment is navigated to. 您处理如果你需要了解有关在导航开始前导航请求的信息。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts. 此信息位于对象传递给事件处理程序。This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler. 一个对象的导航已创建，并从可用参数，则实际请求未在这里进行，因为你可以重新配置对象，如有必要。A object for the navigation is created and available from the parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the object, if necessary. 你还处理取消导航栏中，如果需要，通过设置为 true。You also handle to cancel navigation, if required, by setting to true. 如果取消导航，则会不引发任何其他导航事件。If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的应用程序托管在浏览器中，您不能离开你的应用程序通过取消阻止用户事件。If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the event. 通过导航器导航到内容的第一条后 (， )，每个段导航离开的内容添加到导航历史记录。After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (, ), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history. 如果需要保存在导航离开的内容有关的状态信息，您可以将状态添加到该内容的日记条目通过设置与对象。If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting with a object. > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理以检测是否发出请求以刷新静态内容，如果是这样，若要取消请求。The following example shows how to handle to detect whether a request to refresh static content has been made and, if so, to cancel the request. 。. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatingcode)]

summary.span: 在导航到所请求内容出错时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当要么或导航期间引发引发事件。When either a or an is thrown during a navigation, the event is raised. 传递封装有关异常和导致异常的导航的详细信息的信息。 is passed a that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception. 时异常结果因导航失败，并且未经处理，按所列顺序引发以下事件：When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed: - 。. - 或 。 or . - 。. - 。. 如果导航器 (， ) 由一个或多个导航器承载`NavigationFailed`其中任何一个不引发。If a navigator (, ) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationProgress As NavigationProgressEventHandler

summary.span: 在下载过程中定期发生，用于提供定位进度信息。

span.span: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递公开以下进度信息： is passed a which exposes the following progress information: - 到目前为止下载的字节数 ()。Number of bytes downloaded so far (). - 若要下载的总字节数 ()。Number of total bytes to download (). 引发的每个 1024 个字节的内容下载之后，并一次的剩余字节数是否过小于 1024 个字节。 is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes. 出于此原因，处理提供有用的方式来跟踪和显示当前下载的进度。For this reason, handling provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download. 将不会引发在某些情况下，例如当相同内容的片段导航到，或当内容片段导航到当前加载的内容 (即，值属性)。 won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the property). 导航到已编译的 XAML 资源最终时可能不会引发事件。When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final event may not be raised. 这意味着，在下载结束时，最后一个报告值可能不等于值。This means that at the end of the download, the last reported value may not equal the value. 处理导航已完成时要通知的事件。Handle the event to be notified when the navigation has finished. > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationStopped As NavigationStoppedEventHandler

summary.span: 在调用 方法时发生，或者在当前导航正处于进行过程中时又请求一个新导航时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您处理如果您需要下载停止时发现导航请求有关的信息。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped. 此信息位于对象传递给事件处理程序，并包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 请求的 URI。The requested URI. - 导航器 (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他数据，如果启动了导航，通过调用或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . > [!NOTE] > 当将引发，它还会发出上的事件对象。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 重新加载当前内容。

span.span: Reloads the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前的内容 (指定的值属性) 再次，导航到不会下载内容。If the current content (specified by the value of the property) is navigated to again, does not download the content again. 若要强制若要重新导航到内容，请调用。To force to re-navigate to the content, call . 请注意，如果当前内容导航到同样，通过调用或，新的条目不会添加到导航历史记录。Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling or , a new entry is not added to navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry RemoveBackEntry() cil managed

summary.span: 移除后退历史记录中的最新日记条目。

span.span: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.

returns.span: 后退导航历史记录中的最新 （如果有）。

span.span: The most recent in back navigation history, if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个或多个导航器 (， ) 共享相同的导航历史记录，可以使用一个导航器检索发生在另一个导航器中导航的后退导航历史记录条目。If two or more navigators (, ) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Source : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前内容的 URI，或当前正在导航到的新内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.

value.span: 一个，其中包含当前内容或当前正在导航到的内容 URI。

span.span: A that contains the URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为不同的 URI 与当前正在显示，导航器 (， ) 导航到指定的 URI。If you set this property to a different URI than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (, ) navigates to the specified URI. 除非取消导航，则从 URI 导航到，加载的内容设置。 is set to the content that is loaded from the URI that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled. 可以设置使用仅限片段的 URI，并可以将设置为`null`。 can be set with a fragment-only URI, and can be set to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopLoading() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 停止为当前导航请求下载更多内容。

span.span: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用就立即返回，并停止正在子帧中进行导航。 can be called as soon as returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames. ().(). 调用方法将引发事件。Calling the method raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 必须在启动了导航的同一线程上调用。 must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何停止加载。The following example demonstrates how to stop loading. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowstoploadingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowstoploadingcode)]
